scripts.prestart: npm run build:mfe-app-1 && npm run build:mfe-app-2 && npm run copy-mfe-modules
scripts.build: npm run build:mfe-shared && npm run build:mfe-app-1 && npm run build:mfe-app-2 && npm run build:host-app
scripts.postbuild: cp dist/mfe-app-1/browser/main.js dist/host-app/mfe-app-1.js && cp dist/mfe-app-2/browser/main.js dist/host-app/mfe-app-2.js
scripts.copy-mfe-modules: cp dist/mfe-app-1/browser/main.js projects/host-app/public/mfe-app-1.js && cp dist/mfe-app-2/browser/main.js projects/host-app/public/mfe-app-2.js
